fields.name: Thundering Might (C1)
fields.value: Recasting Stellar Restoration while a Lightning Stiletto is present causes Keqing to deal 50% of her ATK as AoE Electro DMG at the start point and terminus of her Blink.

fields.name: Keen Extraction (C2)
fields.value: When Keqing's Normal and Charged Attack's hit enemies affected by Electro, they have a 50% chance of producing an Elemental Particle. This effect can only occur once every 5s.

fields.name: Forseen Reformation (C3)
fields.value:
Increases the Level of Starward Sword by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

fields.name: Attunement (C4)
fields.value: For 10s after Keqing triggers an Electro-related Elemental Reaction, her ATK is increased by 25%.

fields.name: Beckoning Stars (C5)
fields.value:
Increase the Level of Stellar Restoration by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

fields.name: Tenacious Star (C6)
fields.value: When initiating a Normal Attack, Charged Attack, Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst, Keqing gains a 6% Electro DMG Bonus for 8s. Effects triggered by Normal Attacks, Charged Attacks, Elemental Skills and Elemental Bursts are considered independent entities.
